choices.activity_hint: Tending to the town's flower beds and public garden displays.
Collecting wildflowers and checking on the orchard's apple blossoms.
Gathering flowers from Fluttershy's garden and learning about flower care.
Creating floral arrangements for town events and maintaining public spaces.
Helping Rarity with floral accessories and discussing garden-inspired fashion.
Researching rare flower species and botanical care techniques.
Discussing edible flower decorations with Pinkie Pie for parties and events.
Teaching young ponies about flowers and helping with school garden projects.
Learning about flower-friendly insects and sustainable gardening practices.
Helping the Cutie Mark Crusaders with their nature and gardening projects.
Planning seasonal flower displays and coordinating with town officials.
Exploring the countryside for seasonal wildflowers and enjoying nature.
Having peaceful conversations about nature and animal-friendly gardening.
Preparing weekend event decorations and community flower displays.
Socializing with friends and enjoying weekend treats while discussing gardening.
Browsing for inspiration and chatting with Rarity about artistic creativity.
Taking a casual lunch break and meeting other ponies in town.
Participating in weekend community events and flower shows.
Enjoying peaceful nature walks and identifying wild plants with Fluttershy.
Relaxing in the apple orchards and sketching flower arrangement ideas.
Quietly reading gardening books and botanical journals.
Reading about botany and garden design for personal enrichment.
Having tea with Rarity and discussing artistic inspiration from nature.
Planning the upcoming week's floral themes and seasonal displays.
Checking on any ongoing garden projects with the young ponies.
